definition: A financial transaction made by individuals or entities to fulfill their legal obligation towards the government, typically involving the transfer of funds or assets. It is commonly associated with the fulfillment of tax obligations.

examples.english: The tax payment is made annually.

examples.german: Die Steuerzahlung muss bis zum 31. Mai erfolgen.
examples.english: The tax payment must be made by May 31st.

examples.german: Die Steuerzahlung kann in Raten erfolgen.
examples.english: The tax payment can be made in installments.

examples.german: Die Steuerzahlung ist pünktlich zu leisten.
examples.english: The tax payment must be made on time.

examples.german: Die Steuerzahlung wird automatisch vom Konto abgebucht.
examples.english: The tax payment is automatically debited from the account.
